title: GPU Memery leak
body_html:
in 0.4.0 and the nightly version of pytorch

if I do a lot of inference on the GPU and I accumulate the result with torch.cat on the CPU like that:
y_predlabel = torch.cat((y_predlabel, batch_y_predlabel.cpu()))

the GPU memory increase over time and until I have a Runtime Error: cuda out of memory but if I comment the previous line I have no problem.

The tensors on the GPU looks to never be free but I do batch_y_predlabel.cpu()

body:
in 0.4.0 and the nightly version of pytorch

if I do a lot of inference on the **GPU** and I accumulate the result with `torch.cat` on the **CPU** like that:
`y_predlabel = torch.cat((y_predlabel, batch_y_predlabel.cpu()))`

the **GPU** memory increase over time and until I have a `Runtime Error: cuda out of memory` but if I comment the previous line I have no problem.

The tensors on the **GPU** looks to never be free but I do `batch_y_predlabel.cpu()`
